infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Dental Icons Doctor needs access to your photo library to allow uploading images for profiles or clinic details.
infoPlist.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: Dental Icons Doctor uses speech recognition to allow voice-to-text functionality for clinic forms and bookings.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Dental Icons Doctor uses your location to connect you with nearby service providers and improve your experience.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: Dental Icons Doctor uses your location even when the app is not active to provide seamless service.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Dental Icons Doctor uses your data to provide location-based services and a personalized experience.
